metadata.feature_description: View and manage assigned workflow tasks for content review and approval

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access My Work Feature via Module Actions

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to Workflow Test Page
steps.expected: Page loads with HTML module visible
steps.actual: Page loaded successfully with HTML module containing test workflow content

steps.action: Accessed My Work control via URL (ctl/MyWork/ModuleId/1054)
steps.expected: My Work page should display with list of workflow tasks
steps.actual: Page loaded but content area was completely empty - no My Work interface rendered

steps.action: Investigated cleanup files and code to understand feature status
steps.expected: Feature should be available in HTML Pro module
steps.actual: File 08.02.00.txt confirms MyWork.ascx was marked for cleanup/removal in version 08.02.00

issues: The My Work Tasks feature (MyWork.ascx) has been deprecated and removed in version 08.02.00. The module control is still registered in the manifest but the actual file was cleaned up, resulting in an empty page when accessed.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search for Alternative My Work Location in PersonaBar

steps.expected: Should find My Work or Tasks option in Content menu
steps.actual: Content menu shows only: Assets, Pages, Forms, Content Library, Recycle Bin. No My Work or Tasks option available.

issues: No 'My Work' or 'Tasks' option exists in the PersonaBar Content menu. The legacy My Work feature has not been replaced with an equivalent standalone UI.

steps.action: Entered page edit mode on workflow-enabled page
steps.actual: Edit bar shows Discard, Reject, and Close buttons for managing workflow state of the current page

observations: Code evidence confirms the My Work feature was deprecated: The file 08.02.00.txt explicitly lists 'DesktopModules\HTML\MyWork.ascx' for cleanup/removal.
The module control registration for 'MyWork' still exists in dnn_HtmlPro.dnn manifest, but the actual .ascx file has been removed, causing the control to render nothing.
Workflow management functionality has been migrated to an integrated approach within the page editing experience using the EditBar (Discard/Reject/Close buttons).
The modern workflow approach manages workflow at the page level rather than through a separate module-level 'My Work' interface.

The suggested test scenarios (View assigned tasks list, Filter tasks by status, Sort tasks by date/priority, Navigate to content from task, Complete task approval, View task details, Bulk approve/reject tasks) cannot be tested as the legacy My Work UI feature no longer exists.
Dependency features 'Content Workflow Management' and 'Content Approval Process' have also been modernized and integrated into the page workflow system.
